title: Making a team for ward skin
body: Looking for some people to make a team so that we can get points towards the ward skin, I don't care what your skill level is or what you main, just add me ingame and we can sort anything out.

replies.body: im b1 main jg and top

IGN: thatsbs
Rank: Silv 4
Role: Sup, ad ,jg

Rank: Plat 5
Role: Pref Sup, but can do any
TeamSpeak, Skype, Curse : Skype
